about_the_game:
Partisans 1941 – Supporter Pack

ABOUT THIS PACK

This is a collection of bonus content for those who wish to go the extra mile to support the developers of Partisans 1941.

What do I get as a supporter?

  • The entire Partisans 1941 soundtrack. The collection of driving songs will surely get you in the right mood to command a fierce resistance group!
  • The Partisans 1941 Artbook & Strategy Guide. Take a look into the production and design of the game and optimize your strategy to beat even the hardest challenges.
  • "Polcun" the camp dog! You will find Polcun hanging around in your partisan camp, where he takes the role of a fluffy feelgood-manager.

Soundtrack


1 Abandoned district (3:33)
2 Air Base (4:06)
3 Backwater (4:14)
4 Car workshop (3:56)
5 Elevator (4:09)
6 Farm (3:58)
7 Hospital (3:58)
8 Hunter on the lake (4:01)
9 Lost (3:57)
10 Marauder road (3:58)
11 Partisans Main Theme (3:37)
12 Prison camp (4:05)
13 Partisans Battle Theme (2:18)
14 Train station (4:05)
15 Warehouse (4:13)
16 Command post (3:59)

Partisans 1941 – Supporter Pack

ABOUT THIS PACK

This is a collection of bonus content for those who wish to go the extra mile to support the developers of Partisans 1941.

name: Partisans 1941 - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF reader needed to view artbook/strategy guide
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
